tweets.text:
Revealed: no penalties issued under 'useless' UK farm pollution laws 

 - @EnvAgency has not prosecuted or fined any of 243 documented violations since 2018

 - EA funding fell by 63% between 2009 and 2019

https://t.co/09VvG2gnVu

We have transformed a 0.5km stretch of the River Ash to provide new habitats for fish, invertebrates and waterfowl to thrive; with benefits for human visitors too. Thanks to our partners @SpelthorneBC @EnvAgency & Spelthorne Nat His Soc

Good to see the Cottingham and Orchard Park Flood Alleviation Scheme working as designed! Snow and rainfall has been filtered through the lagoons causing them to fill with water and protect the surrounding properties from flooding.

@East_Riding @EnvAgency @Pell_Frischmann https://t.co/X5HfgLkVeW

We‚Äôve set the ambitious goal of becoming a net zero organisation by 2030.

We‚Äôve already reduced our direct emissions by 47%, but we're planning to cut emissions even further by innovating and driving down emissions with our supply chain.
